title: Allowlist a specific Principal as admin

requirements.text: Update the backend admin allowlist so that Principal `vtyfq-kcl6h-mvrxs-ixdx3-ew454-lywvd-3om5o-z3adc-gankr-lwzz2-jae` is recognized as an admin by the canister (i.e., `AccessControl.isAdmin(accessControlState, caller)` returns true for that Principal) and can access all existing admin-only methods.

quotes: I want to make this principal id : vtyfq-kcl6h-mvrxs-ixdx3-ew454-lywvd-3om5o-z3adc-gankr-lwzz2-jae the admin

acceptanceCriteria: When authenticated as `vtyfq-kcl6h-mvrxs-ixdx3-ew454-lywvd-3om5o-z3adc-gankr-lwzz2-jae`, admin-only backend methods (e.g., `getAdminDashboardStats`, `getAllPayoutRequests`, `updatePayoutRequestStatus`, `createTask`) succeed without trapping with "Unauthorized: Only admins can perform this action".
When authenticated as a non-admin principal, admin-only backend methods continue to trap with the existing unauthorized error.
The admin allowlist change persists after redeploy/upgrade (if the admin list is stored in stable state, include the necessary upgrade/migration logic to keep existing admins and add this new one).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).

Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything in frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Fixing the production URL loading issue (blank/never loads) is out of scope for this request unless it is directly required to verify the admin allowlist change.
Adding new admin UI features or changing admin page layouts is out of scope.
